Tonight, the mead hall has been inflamed by rumors of a great wolf wandering through the forests near [Root.Capital.GetName]. The man who spotted the beast claims that it is without a doubt one of Airitech's children, escaped from her den beneath the earth. The older members of the Lodge agree that, as the [Root.GetLordLady] of [Root.Capital.GetName], it is my duty to track down and slay this beast.

Tonight, the mead hall has been inflamed by rumors of a great lion terrorizing the plains of [Root.Capital.GetName]. The warrior who spotted the beast claims that it is a child of Bast and a known eater of men. The older members of the Lodge agree that, as the [Root.GetLordLady] of [Root.Capital.GetName], it is my duty to track down and slay this beast.

A stranger has appeared at your court. "They says they will only speak to you, my [Root.GetLordLady]," a servant bows before you, clearly annoyed. You pause. What is this about? The times are busy in [Root.Capital.GetName] and you were in the middle of contemplating whether you should have a grand feast thrown in your name or arrange for a prestigious hunting trip. There is always someone to impress, and you would rather not get involved in the drama of the court. You glance at the servant, still bowing deeply. Very well...\n\nIn the main hall a hooded figure approaches you.
column3: Une ÈtrangËre est apparue ‡ la Cour. ´†Elle dit qu'elle ne parlera qu'‡ vous, M[Root.GetOnA][Root.GetLordLady]†ª, dit un serviteur inclinÈ face ‡ vous, clairement ennuyÈ. Vous vous arrÍtez. ´†Quoi encore†?!†ª, dites-vous. Les journÈes sont bien remplies ‡ [Root.Capital.GetName] et vous Ètiez en train de vous demander si vous devriez organiser un grand banquet en votre nom ou plutÙt une grande tournÈe de chasse. Il y a toujours quelqu'un qui insiste, et vous prÈfÈreriez ne pas vous impliquer dans ce mÈlodrame qu'est la cour. Vous jetez un coup d'oeil sur le serviteur, toujours respectueusement courbÈ. ´†Bon...†ª \n\nDans la grande salle, une silhouette encapuchonnÈe vient vers vous.
column4: Eine Unbekannte ist bei Hof eingetroffen. "Nur mit Euch persˆnlich mˆchte sie sprechen, [Root.GetLordLady]", teilt ein Diener Euch naser¸mpfend mit. Ihr stutzt einen Augenblick. Worum geht es denn? Es ist viel zu tun in [Root.Capital.GetName] und gerade hattet Ihr Euch in tiefer Versenkung der Frage gewidmet, ob ein groﬂes Bankett einer pompˆse Jagd vielleicht vorzuziehen sei. Dem Hof und seine Dramen w¸rdet Ihr lieber ausweichen. Ihr werft einen kurzen Blick auf den Diener, der immer noch in tief verbeugt dasteht. Nun gut ...\n\nAls Ihr in der Haupthalle ankommt, wartet dort, bis zur Vermummung in weite Gew‰nder geh¸llt, ein Besucher auf Euch.
column6: Una extraÒa aparece en tu corte. Dice que solo hablar· con vos, mi [Root.GetLordLady]ª, un sirviente se inclina ante ti, claramente molesto. Te detienes. øQuÈ sucede? Son dÌas muy ocupados en [Root.Capital.GetName] y estabas considerando si celebrar un gran banquete en tu hombre u organizar una cacerÌa prestigiosa. Siempre hay alguien a quien impresionar y preferirÌas que no te involucrasen en los dramas de la corte. Miras al sirviente, a˙n profundamente inclinado. Est· bienÖ\n\nEn el salÛn principal una figura encapuchada se te acerca.

column2: [GetImmortalMysticIntroduction]

You expected a wrinkled old man, and the alleged mystic standing before you is that, to a degree. The man who introduces himself as [From.GetFirstName] has an undeniably youthful energy. His voice is as smooth as honey and his smile charms all it shines upon. You invite him to dine with you and his conversation is most intriguing. He claims to hold the secrets to eternal life and vitality and offers to teach you more, if you are willing to accept his quest.\n\nWhile it is impossible to know if this old man speaks the truth, at least he seems very lively for his apparent age. But is he immortal...?

You expected a wrinkled old man, and the alleged mystic standing before you is that, to a degree. Although he is very different compared to all the other men at court, no one can deny his youthful energy. With a voice as smooth as honey and tinged with a foreign accent he introduces himself as [From.GetFirstName]. You invite him to dine with you and his conversation is most intriguing, if not outright controversial at times. He claims to hold the secrets to eternal life and vitality and offers to teach you more, if you are willing to accept his quest. \n\nWhile it is impossible to know if this charming man speaks the truth, at least he seems very lively for his apparent age. But is he immortal...?

The tall figure offers you a nod, but does not smile. [From.GetSheHeCap] eyes you skeptically, measuring you up as much as you are [From.GetHerHim]. [From.GetHerHisCap] clothing is modest and posture clearly that of a warrior's. "I am [From.GetTitledFirstName]. You are [Root.GetFirstName]," [From.GetSheHe] says, as if somebody had forgotten to introduce you. Perhaps you should have spoken the first words, to assert your position, but the muscular [From.GetManWoman] makes you more than a little nervous. \n\n"I hear you are looking to live forever," [From.GetSheHe] finally says, more a statement than question. "I can help."

The tall figure offers you a nod, but does not smile. [From.GetSheHeCap] eyes you skeptically, measuring you up as much as you are [From.GetHerHim]. [From.GetHerHisCap] clothing, clearly fashioned to show [From.GetHerHis] muscled physique, is foreign to you and you have trouble concealing your confusion. In fact, the warrior before you is bound to stand out in your court in more ways than one. "I am [From.GetTitledFirstName]. You are [Root.GetFirstName]," [From.GetSheHe] says, as if somebody had forgotten to introduce you. Perhaps you should have spoken the first words, to assert your position, but the muscular [From.GetManWoman] makes you more than a little nervous. \n\n"I hear you are looking to live forever," [From.GetSheHe] finally says, more a statement than question. "I can help."

The tall figure offers you a nod & an enormous smile. [From.GetSheHeCap] eyes you skeptically, measuring you up as much as you are [From.GetHerHim]. [From.GetHerHisCap] is shirtless, but their pantaloons go up to their pecs. [From.GetHerHisCap] is not quite what you expected from a warrior. "I am [From.GetTitledFirstName]. You are [Root.GetFirstName]," [From.GetSheHe] says, as if somebody had forgotten to introduce you. Perhaps you should have spoken the first words, to assert your position, but the muscular [From.GetManWoman] makes you more than a little nervous. \n\n"I hear you are looking to live forever," [From.GetSheHe] finally says, more a statement than question. "I can help."

The tall figure offers you a nod & an enormous smile. [From.GetSheHeCap] eyes you skeptically, measuring you up as much as you are [From.GetHerHim]. [From.GetHerHisCap] is shirtless, but their pantaloons go up to their pecs- foreign fashion, obviously, and you have trouble concealing your confusion. In fact, the warrior before you is bound to stand out in your court in more ways than one. "I am [From.GetTitledFirstName]. You are [Root.GetFirstName]," [From.GetSheHe] says, as if somebody had forgotten to introduce you. Perhaps you should have spoken the first words, to assert your position, but the muscular [From.GetManWoman] makes you more than a little nervous. \n\n"I hear you are looking to live forever," [From.GetSheHe] finally says, more a statement than question. "I can help."

The woman introduces herself as [From.GetTitledFirstName] and proceeds to tell you about the noble art of alchemy. She claims to possess the secret knowledge of transmuting the base metals into gold and creating something she calls "alkahest". However, more importantly, she tells you tales of the mysterious Philosopher's Stone which grants its maker eternal life. If you accept her quest, she promises to share her secrets with you.\n\nWhile it is impossible to know if this alleged mystic tells the truth, she sounds knowledgeable. Judging from her beautiful skin and graceful manner she couldn't possibly be as old as she claims. But is she immortal...?

The peculiar woman, her sun-kissed skin visible beneath a gold circlet, introduces herself as [From.GetTitledFirstName]. At least that is what you think she said - her words are distorted with a foreign accent. She claims to possess the secret knowledge of transmuting the base metals into gold, and more importantly, she tells you tales of the mysterious Philosopher's Stone. If you are to believe her words, it grants its maker eternal life. \n\nWhile you normally would not be inclined to trust a woman like this, her words do intrigue you. In any case her words are convincing, but judging from her beautiful skin and graceful manner she couldn't possibly be as old as she claims. But is she immortal...?

The young man introduces himself as [From.GetTitledFirstName] and extols the benefits of enlightenment, and the ability of alchemy to help you reach it. He claims to know the secrets of the science, including the legendary ambrosia, food of the gods that can make immortals out of the mortal. You aren't in the habit of taking such men at their word, but he has an educated bearing and eyes that show wisdom beyond his apparent years. But is he immortal?

The strange young man, dressed in odd clothes perhaps meant to appear scholarly, introduces himself as [From.GetTitledFirstName]. Unsure how to pronounce his name correctly, you go out of your way to avoid saying it. The man extols the benefits of enlightenment, and the ability of alchemy to help you reach it. He claims to know the secrets of the science, including the legendary ambrosia, food of the gods that can make immortals out of the mortal. You aren't in the habit of taking such men at their word, but he has an educated bearing and eyes that show wisdom beyond his apparent years. But is he immortal?

The old man dressed in noble clothes introduces himself as [From.GetTitledFirstName] and extols the benefits of enlightenment, and the ability of alchemy to help you reach it. He claims to know the secrets of the science, including the legendary ambrosia, food of the gods that can make immortals out of the mortal. You aren't in the habit of taking such men at their word, but he has an educated bearing and eyes that show youth that belies his age. But is he immortal?

The strange old man, dressed in odd clothes perhaps meant to appear noble, introduces himself as [From.GetTitledFirstName]. Unsure how to pronounce his name correctly, you go out of your way to avoid saying it. The man extols the benefits of enlightenment, and the ability of alchemy to help you reach it. He claims to know the secrets of the science, including the legendary ambrosia, food of the gods that can make immortals out of the mortal. You aren't in the habit of taking such men at their word, but he has an educated bearing and eyes that show youth that belies his age. But is he immortal?

[From.GetFirstName] tells you a tale about a hidden glade in which an ancient apple tree grows. The apples are the most delicious in the world, but more importantly, anyone who eats them become young anew. [From.GetSheHeCap] offers to help you find the glade, but [From.GetSheHe] also warns you that the search will not be easy and potentially very dangerous. \n\n[From.GetFirstName] urges you to form a fellowship of brave warriors to aid you in your quest. While you could just order some of your soldiers to tag along, [From.GetSheHe] insists that they must follow you out of loyalty, not only by duty. [From.GetSheHeCap] suggests that you arrange a grand feast and speak to them from your heart.

It is the night of your feast and warriors have come from far and wide. The word must have spread because there are far more guests than expected. Luckily, with [From.GetFirstName]'s help you manage to make room for everybody and after raiding the stores there is enough food and wine to go around. The music is jolly, the spirits are high and laughter echoes in your hall. \n\nHalfway through the dinner, you stand up to hold you speech. At first you are nervous, but when you see the fervor light up in the guests' eyes, your confidence rises. You deliver the best and most passionate speech of your life. By the end of it, the crowd stands up, howling and applauding. You look to your right where [From.GetFirstName] is seatedñ [From.GetSheHe] is beaming at you. It seems like you have your fellowship.

column1: ###### Not overridden yet, but I want to flavor this for Neoplatonists

column2:
[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

The hectic life of a ruler rarely allows for sufficient time for contemplation. I ask of you to seclude yourself and think about your life and your actions in order to reach a better understanding of the world.

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
column3:
[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

La vie trÈpidante d'un dirigeant laisse rarement suffisamment de temps pour la contemplation. Je vous demande de vous isoler et de penser ‡ votre vie et ‡ vos actions afin de parvenir ‡ une meilleure comprÈhension du monde.

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
SignÈ, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
column4:
[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

Das hektische Leben eines Herrschers l‰sst selten gen¸gend Zeit um Nachzudenken. Ich bitte euch daher euch zur¸ckzuziehen und ¸ber Leben und Handlungen nachzudenken, um ein besseres Verst‰ndnis der Welt zu erlangen.

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Gezeichnet, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
column6:
[Root.GetMOGreeting],[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]

La vida agitada de un gobernante raramente permite tiempo suficiente para la contemplaciÛn. Te pido aislarte, reflexionar sobre tu vida y acciones para alcanzar un mejor entendimiento del mundo.

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Firmado, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

column2: Neoplatonism Resurgent

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to restore the three ancient Schools of Neoplatonism. Based upon the pursuit of reason and moderation, Neoplatonists believe in shunning all excesses and passions in favor of a balanced and rational approach to life, centered around the virtues of Wisdom, Courage, Temperance, and Justice.\nAlthough membership is not excluded to other religions, these philosophies have always been closely related to Hellenism.
The Stoics shall be a bulwark for civilized society!
The Skeptics shall be a voice of reason!
The Epicureans will spread enlightenment!

column2: The hooded [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s from [sponsoring_king.Capital.GetName] arrive at dawn, but the ceremony begins only after sunset, once they have helped the icons of the new gods adjust to their new home in your temple.\nYou meet with your vassals outside the city, a crowd of your subjects assembling all around you, and then, under the grim echoes of drums and horns, the [sponsoring_king.Culture.GetNameCap] [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s begin the rite. They paint your faces with the blood of the sacrificial lambs, burn sacred herbs and chant their secret spells, as you all enter a trance.\nVisions of horror and delight accompany you for the rest of the night. When you wake at dawn of the next day, the [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s are already gone. Little by little, the confused crowd of converts returns to [converting_king.Capital.GetName].
column3: Les [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s encapuchonnÈs de [sponsoring_king.Capital.GetName] arrivent ‡ l'aube, mais la cÈrÈmonie commence seulement aprËs le coucher du soleil, une fois qu'ils ont aidÈ ‡ adapter les icÙnes ‡ leur nouvelle maison dans votre temple.\nVous retrouvez vos vassaux ‡ l'extÈrieur de la ville, une foule de sujets se rassemblant tout autour de vous, et puis, sous les Èchos sombres des tambours et des cornes, les [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s [sponsoring_king.Culture.GetNameCap]s commencent le rite. Ils peignent vos visages avec le sang des agneaux sacrificiels, br˚lent des herbes sacrÈes et rÈcitent leurs incantations secrËtes, alors que vous entrez en transe.\nDes pensÈes d'horreur et de joie vous accompagnent pour le reste de la nuit. Lorsque vous vous rÈveillez ‡ l'aube, les [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s sont dÈj‡ partis. Petit ‡ petit, la foule de convertis retourne ‡ la capitale.
column4: Die verh¸llten [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetPriestTitleCap] aus [sponsoring_king.Capital.GetName] kommen im Morgengrauen an, aber die Zeremonie beginnt erst nach Sonnenuntergang, nachdem sie die Gˆtzen der neuen Gˆtter ein neues Zuhause in Eurem Tempel gegeben haben.\nIhr trefft Euch mit Euren Vasallen auﬂerhalb der Stadt, wo sich viele Eurer Untertanen um Euch herum versammeln. Dann, von Trommeln und Hˆrnern begleitet, beginnen die [sponsoring_king.Culture.GetNameCap] [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetPriestTitleCap] den Ritus. Sie malen Eure Gesichter mit dem Blut der Opferl‰mmer an, verbrennen heilige Kr‰uter und singen geheime Zauberspr¸che, w‰hrend ihr alle in Trance verfallt.\nVisionen des Schreckens und der Freude begleiten Euch f¸r den Rest der Nacht. Als ihr im Morgengrauen des n‰chsten Tages aufwacht, sind die [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetPriestTitleCap] schon weg. Nach und nach kehrt die verwirrte Menge an neu Konvertierten nach [converting_king.Capital.GetName] zur¸ck.
column6: Los [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s encapuchados de [sponsoring_king.Capital.GetName] llegan al alba, pero la ceremonia solo empieza tras el atardecer, tras ayudar a ajustar los iconos de los nuevos dioses al nuevo hogar de tu templo.\nTe encuentras con tus vasallos a las afueras de la ciudad, donde se ha reunido una multitud de tus s˙bditos, y bajo los l˙gubres ecos de cuernos y tambores, los [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s [sponsoring_king.Culture.GetNameCap]s comienzan el rito. Os pintan la cara con la sangre de los corderos sacrificados, queman hierbas sagradas, recitan sus conjuros secretos, mientras entr·is en trance.\nVisiones de horrores y deleites os acompaÒan el resto de la noche. Cuando despiertas al dÌa siguiente, los [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s ya se han ido. Poco a poco, la masa confusa de conversos regresa a [converting_king.Capital.GetName].

column2: The hooded [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetPriestTitle] from [sponsoring_king.Capital.GetName] arrive at dawn, but the ceremony begins only after sunset, after they have helped the icons of the new gods adjust to their new home in [converting_king.GetTitledFirstName]'s temple.\nYou meet with your liege outside the city, a crowd of [converting_king.GetHerHis] subjects assembling all around you, and then, under the grim echoes of drums and horns, the [sponsoring_king.Culture.GetNameCap] [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s begin the rite. They paint your faces with the blood of the sacrificial lambs, burn sacred herbs and chant their secret spells, as you all enter a trance.\nVisions of horror and delight accompany you for the rest of the night. When you wake at dawn of the next day, the [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetPriestTitle] are already gone. Little by little, the confused crowd of converts returns to [converting_king.Capital.GetName].
column3: Les [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s encapuchonnÈs de [sponsoring_king.Capital.GetName] arrivent ‡ l'aube, mais la cÈrÈmonie commence seulement aprËs le coucher du soleil, une fois qu'ils ont aidÈ ‡ adapter les icÙnes des nouveaux dieux ‡ leur nouvelle maison dans votre temple.\nVous retrouvez votre [Root.Liege.GetLordLady] lige ‡ l'extÈrieur de la ville, une foule de sujets se rassemblant tout autour de vous, et puis, sous les Èchos sombres des tambours et des cornes, les [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s [sponsoring_king.Culture.GetNameCap]s commencent le rite. Ils peignent vos visages avec le sang des agneaux sacrificiels, br˚lent des herbes sacrÈes et rÈcitent leurs incantations secrËtes, alors que vous entrez en transe.\nDes pensÈes d'horreur et de joie vous accompagnent pour le reste de la nuit. Lorsque vous vous rÈveillez ‡ l'aube, les [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s sont dÈj‡ partis. Petit ‡ petit, la foule de convertis retourne ‡ la capitale.
column4: Die verh¸llten [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetPriestTitleCap] aus [sponsoring_king.Capital.GetName] kommen im Morgengrauen an, aber die Zeremonie beginnt erst nach Sonnenuntergang, nachdem sie die Gˆtzen der neuen Gˆtter ein neues Zuhause im Tempel von [converting_king.GetTitledFirstName] gegeben haben.\nIhr trefft Euch mit Eurem Lehnsherrn auﬂerhalb der Stadt, wo sich viele [converting_king.GetHerHis]er Untertanen versammelt haben. Dann, von Trommeln und Hˆrnern begleitet, beginnen die [sponsoring_king.Culture.GetNameCap] [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetPriestTitleCap] den Ritus. Sie malen Eure Gesichter mit dem Blut der Opferl‰mmer an, verbrennen heilige Kr‰uter und singen geheime Zauberspr¸che, w‰hrend ihr alle in Trance verfallt.\nVisionen des Schreckens und der Freude begleiten Euch f¸r den Rest der Nacht. Als ihr im Morgengrauen des n‰chsten Tages aufwacht, sind die [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetPriestTitleCap] schon weg. Nach und nach kehrt die verwirrte Menge an neu Konvertierten nach [converting_king.Capital.GetName] zur¸ck.
column6: Los [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s encapuchados de [sponsoring_king.Capital.GetName] llegan al alba, pero la ceremonia solo empieza tras el atardecer, tras ayudar a los iconos de los nuevos dioses a ajustarse a su nuevo hogar en el templo de [converting_king.GetTitledFirstName].\nTe encuentras con tu seÒor a las afueras de la ciudad, hay una multitud de s˙bditos suyos reunidos a vuestro alrededor y entonces, bajo los l˙gubres ecos de cuernos y tambores, los [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s [sponsoring_king.Culture.GetNameCap]s comienzan el rito. Os pintan la cara con la sangre de los corderos sacrificados, queman hierbas sagradas, recitan sus conjuros secretos, seg˙n entr·is en trance.\nVisiones de horrores y deleites os acompaÒan el resto de la noche. Cuando despiertas al dÌa siguiente, los [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s ya se han ido. Poco a poco, la masa confusa de conversos regresa a [converting_king.Capital.GetName].
